EmailTemplate.description: SFDC1-8767 Incomplete Account Information - Account Reference
EmailTemplate.name: Incomplete Account Information - Account Reference
EmailTemplate.subject: Incomplete Account Information - Account Reference
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello
Please provide the correct legal entity name as well as the full address to complete your request for a new account, for the following - {!Case.CaseNumber} Account Reference: {!Case.AccountReference__c} Thank You
